headline: Jim Cramer Discusses Barclays’ Coverage of Citizens Financial (CFG)
summary: We recently published 9 Stocks Jim Cramer Talked About. Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE:CFG) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer talked about. Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE:CFG) is one of the largest regional banks in America. Its shares are up by 36% over the past year. In late December, Truist raised Citizens Financial Group, […]
